title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid email and password inputs and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input a valid Canadian email address and a strong password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify registration success message is displayed and user is redirected to onboarding.

title: User Registration with Existing Email
description: Verify registration fails when using an email address that is already registered.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input an email already registered and a valid password.
Submit the registration form.
Validate that a proper error message is displayed indicating duplicate email.

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a registered user can login successfully using correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a registered email and correct password.
Click on the login button.
Confirm the user is logged in and redirected to the main dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a registered email and incorrect password.
Click on the login button.
Check for error message indicating invalid credentials and no navigation occurs.

title: Biometric Authentication Login
description: Verify user can login using biometric authentication if enabled.

steps.description: Enable biometric authentication in user settings.
Log out and navigate to login screen.
Select biometric login option and authenticate using biometric input.
User is successfully logged in without typing password.

title: Onboarding: Child Profile Creation
description: Verify that first-time user can create a child profile during onboarding with all required fields.

steps.description: Complete user registration and proceed to onboarding.
Input child name, birthdate, and initial diaper size.
Submit the child profile creation form.
Confirm child profile is created and visible in profile list.

title: Child Profile Create/Edit/Delete Operations
description: Verify user can create additional child profiles, edit existing profiles, and delete them with appropriate confirmations.

steps.description: Navigate to child profile management section.
Add a new child profile with valid data.
New profile appears in the profile list.
Edit the created child profile to change details.
Changes are saved and reflected immediately.
Delete the edited child profile and confirm deletion.
Profile is removed from list and deleted from backend.

title: Inventory Management Traffic Light Status Update
description: Verify that diaper inventory traffic light changes correctly based on stock levels (green/yellow/red).

steps.description: Add diaper inventory with stock above green threshold.
Traffic light indicator shows green.
Add inventory to reduce stock to below yellow threshold.
Traffic light indicator updates to yellow.
Reduce inventory to below red threshold.
Traffic light indicator updates to red indicating low stock.

title: Inventory Quick Add and Remove
description: Verify users can quickly add and remove diaper inventory items and that UI and backend stay in sync.

steps.description: Use quick-add controls to add inventory for a selected diaper size.
Inventory count updates in UI and is persisted.
Use quick-remove controls to reduce inventory count.
Inventory count updates accordingly and reflects correctly across user devices.

title: ML-Powered Reorder Suggestions Accuracy
description: Validate ML model provides reorder suggestions based on historical usage, size changes, and retailer price data.

steps.description: Populate inventory usage data for multiple diaper sizes and child profiles.
Access reorder suggestion screen.
Verify reorder suggestions are displayed with expected reorder timing and size recommendations.
Verify retailer price comparisons show best deals.

title: ML Model Size-Change Prediction Validation
description: Verify that size-change predictions for children are accurate based on growth tracking data.

steps.description: Input child growth measurements over time.
Trigger prediction generation.
Predicted next diaper size aligns with growth trends.

title: Emergency Order Modal Functionality
description: Verify emergency order modal opens correctly and allows placing urgent orders with confirmation and retry options.

steps.description: Trigger emergency order from reorder suggestions page.
Emergency order modal appears with required information.
Place emergency order.
Order confirmation is shown and inventory updates accordingly.
Simulate network failure and retry placing an emergency order.
Retry mechanism works and order succeeds after retry.

title: Analytics Dashboard Loading and Accuracy
description: Verify analytics dashboard loads within 2 seconds with accurate display of usage charts, cost summaries, and predictions.

steps.description: Navigate to analytics dashboard.
Dashboard loads within 2 seconds.
Correct analytics data including weekly usage pattern, cost optimization charts, and size-change predictions are displayed.

title: Family Collaboration Real-Time Synchronization
description: Verify real-time inventory updates and notifications sync correctly across multiple caregiver devices with role-based permission enforcement.

steps.description: User A and User B login to shared family account from different devices.
User A updates inventory and shopping list.
User B sees real-time updates immediately with presence indicators.
Test permission restrictions by attempting prohibited actions from User B based on role.
Unauthorized actions are blocked with proper error messages.

title: Push Notification Delivery and Preference Respect
description: Verify that low stock alerts and reorder reminders are sent reliably as push notifications and respect user-configured preferences.

steps.description: Configure notification preferences to enable low stock alerts and reorder reminders.
Simulate inventory reaching low stock threshold.
Push notification for low stock alert is received on user device.
Disable reorder reminder notifications in preferences.
Trigger reorder reminder event.
No reorder reminder notification is received respecting user choices.

title: Receipt Scanning and OCR Accuracy
description: Verify receipt scanning feature accurately extracts diaper purchase information and updates inventory with user correction options.

steps.description: Scan a receipt with multiple diaper purchase entries.
OCR extracts diaper brands, sizes, and quantities with confidence scores.
Review extracted data and manually correct any errors.
Confirm update of diaper inventory based on scanned receipt.
Inventory reflects the new stock accurately including price and cost tracking.

title: Subscription Trial Activation and Conversion Workflow
description: Verify users can activate a free trial and convert to paid subscriptions with Canadian tax calculations applied correctly.

steps.description: New user activates a trial subscription.
Trial status is active and premium features unlocked.
User initiates subscription upgrade to paid plan.
Billing is processed with correct Canadian tax applied.
Receipt and subscription confirmation displayed.

title: PIPEDA-Compliant Consent Management and Audit Trail
description: Verify that user consent for data collection is requested just-in-time, stored securely with audit trails, and can be updated or withdrawn.

steps.description: Trigger app feature that requires new data consent.
Just-in-time consent modal is shown explaining data usage.
User consents and the action is recorded.
Audit log shows timestamp and consent details.
User withdraws consent from settings.
Consent update is recorded and relevant data is deleted or access revoked.

title: Emergency Dashboard Access and Information Display
description: Validate that emergency dashboard can be accessed quickly and displays correct medical info and emergency contacts for selected child.

steps.description: Navigate to emergency dashboard from main navigation.
Emergency medical cards and contact information for selected child are displayed.
Share emergency info via supported sharing modal.
Information is shared securely with audit of sharing events.

title: App Accessibility Compliance WCAG 2.1 AA
description: Verify that app UI components and navigation comply with WCAG 2.1 AA standards, providing accessible labels, keyboard navigation and color contrast.

steps.description: Navigate through major app screens using keyboard only.
All interactive elements are reachable and focus states are visible.
All UI images and buttons have accessible labels.
Verify color contrast ratios on traffic light indicators and key buttons.
Contrast ratios meet or exceed WCAG 2.1 AA guidelines.

title: App Startup Performance Under 3 Seconds
description: Verify app startup time from launch to home screen load is under 3 seconds on recommended devices.

steps.description: Launch the app fresh from device home screen.
Time from launch to full home screen render is measured and is less than 3 seconds.

title: API Response Time Below 500 ms
description: Verify backend GraphQL APIs respond within 500 milliseconds for typical requests including authentication, inventory, and analytics queries.

steps.description: Send authenticated GraphQL queries for user inventory, child profiles and analytics data.
Each API response is received within 500 ms consistently.

title: Security Audit Verification
description: Verify implementation of encryption, row-level security, and authentication best practices through penetration testing and code review.

steps.description: Conduct penetration testing including authentication bypass, data access attempts, and encryption validation.
No security vulnerabilities found; data access rules enforced correctly.

title: Offline Sync Capability for Inventory Updates
description: Verify that inventory updates made while offline sync correctly once network is restored without data loss or conflicts.

steps.description: Turn off network connectivity and update diaper inventory.
Turn network back on to restore connectivity.
Offline changes sync successfully to backend and reflect on all devices.

title: Subscription Payment Failure Handling
description: Verify app handles failed subscription payments gracefully and notifies users with retry options.

steps.description: Simulate subscription payment failure through billing system.
User is notified of the failed payment with clear messaging.
User attempts payment retry.
Successful retry updates subscription status without data corruption.
